name: Dustbowl Brulo
description:
Brulo has ventures all across Boiler City, including in transportation and demolition. However, he wasn't always the destruction kingpin he is today. Join Brulo in his quest to prepare his signature detonators!

  • Grab components and bring them to your RV!
  • Call Nina for legal protection!
  • Fight off flies and explosive tortoises!
  • Shootouts against Agent Danton!
  • Super tough alternate gamemode!

Listen to the OST here: https://soundcloud.com/poobtunes/sets/dustbowl-brulo-ost

Made for ANTONJAM 3 & BLAST: https://itch.io/jam/antonjam3-the-blast-jam
